product_name: Riverside Bow and Stern Tie-Down Kit - 18 ft.
long_description: This watercraft tie-down kit includes two 18-ft. straps with cam buckles and sewn loops, two straps with sewn loops and four steel S-hooks. Intended to secure the bow and stern of two boats, supplementing your existing car top system (roof rack and straps, or foam blocks and straps).
short_description: This watercraft tie-down kit includes two 18-ft. straps with cam buckles and sewn loops, two straps with sewn loops and four steel S-hooks.
